title: OPEC Secretary General meets with HE Zanganeh, Iranian Petroleum Minister
description: Tehran, IR Iran, 6 August 2021--Ahead of the first meeting of IR Iranâ€™s President Ebrahim Raisi with OPEC Secretary General, Mohammad Sanusi Barkindo, later in the afternoon, the outgoing Petroleum Minister, HE Bijan Zanganeh, hosted the Secretary General at a working lunch.
